:::{.def}

[Polars](https://pola.rs/) is a modern open source and *very fast* DataFrame framework for Python, Rust, JS, R, and Ruby.

In Python—the topic of this course—Polars is much faster than [pandas](https://pandas.pydata.org/) while remaining just as convenient.

:::

*Coming up in fall 2024.*
